content: --- title: Passenger Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-05-09T09:26:22.878Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T12:35:07.136Z --- # PAX Info Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope **Retrieving Pax in Flight Window:**(40 minutes and 20 minutes before Departure Time and 60 minutes, 120 minutes, and 180 minutes after Departure Time) * Retrieve records for flights meeting the following conditions; * {Date Conditions} and * Date Conditions; * (`schedops.LEG.dep_DT` <= Current Date(UTC) + 40 minutes and `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date + 40 minutes) or * (`schedops.LEG.dep_DT` <= Current Date(UTC) + 20 minutes and `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date + 20 minutes) or * (`schedops.LEG.dep_DT` <= Current Date(UTC) - 30 minutes and `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date - 30 minutes) or * (`schedops.LEG.dep_DT` <= Current Date(UTC) - 60 minutes and `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date - 60 minutes) or * (`schedops.LEG.dep_DT` <= Current Date(UTC) - 120 minutes and `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date - 120 minutes) or * (`schedops.LEG.dep_DT` <= Current Date(UTC) - 180 minutes and `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date - 180 minutes) * `schedops.LEG.WHAT_IF` = “_” and * `schedops.LEG.LEG_TYPE` = (“C“ or “J“ or “O“) and * `schedops.LEG.LEG_STATE` <> (“CNL“ or “DEL“ or “INC“) **Retrieving Pax in Operational Window:**(From 74 hours before the departure time, to the departure time) * Retrieve records for flights meeting the following conditions; * `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` <= Current Date(UTC) + 74 hours and * `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date and * `schedops.LEG.WHAT_IF` = “_” and * `schedops.LEG.LEG_TYPE` = (“C“ or “J“ or “O“) and * `schedops.LEG.LEG_STATE` <> (“CNL“ or “DEL“ or “INC“) #### - Source Service * `FlightManifest` * WSDL: `https://iflyresapi.ibsgen.com/iRes_Booking_WS/services/FlightPort` * Method: `retrieveFlightManifest` #### -
